title: Mxtorie Report Program
description: Enhance your game's integrity with MxtorieACIA Report Program. Allow players to submit detailed reports with evidence. Effortlessly manage and review reports with comprehensive tools. Ensure a fair gaming environment with robust reporting features.
longDescription:
Discord server : link here

Website : link here

MxtorieACIA Report Program


- Overview

MxtorieACIA Report Program is a comprehensive solution designed to enhance your gameâ€™s integrity by enabling players to submit detailed reports on suspicious activities. This program offers a robust set of features for managing and reviewing player reports, ensuring a fair and secure gaming environment.

- Key Features

  • Detailed Reporting: Players can submit reports with detailed descriptions and various types of evidence, including images and links, to support their claims.
  • Evidence Management: The system allows for up to 3 images and 10 links per report, making it easy for players to provide substantial evidence.
  • Intuitive Interface: Our user-friendly interface ensures that both players and administrators can navigate and use the system with ease.
  • Real-Time Notifications: Stay updated with real-time notifications about new reports and updates.
  • Comprehensive Review Tools: Administrators have access to tools that allow them to review, comment on, and resolve reports efficiently.
  • Customizable Filters: Filter reports based on various criteria such as resolution status, reason for the report, and more.
  • Pagination and Search: Easily navigate through reports with pagination and search functionalities, ensuring no report is overlooked.
  • Responsive Design: The system is fully responsive, providing a seamless experience across all devices.
  • Security: Ensures that all submitted data is securely stored and only accessible to authorized personnel.

- How It Works

  1. Report Submission:
  • Players can submit reports through an intuitive form that allows them to provide detailed descriptions and upload evidence.
  • Each report is tagged with relevant metadata, including the reason for the report and the resolution status.
  1. Evidence Upload:
  • Players can upload up to 3 images and provide up to 10 links to support their reports.
  • The system automatically formats and displays the evidence in a clear and organized manner.
  1. Admin Review:
  • Administrators receive real-time notifications about new reports.
  • Using the comprehensive review tools, admins can evaluate the evidence, add comments, and change the resolution status of reports.
  1. Filtering and Searching:
  • Use the customizable filters to view reports based on specific criteria.
  • The search functionality helps in quickly finding specific reports by ID, IP, HWID, or reason.
  1. Resolution:
  • Once a report is reviewed, admins can mark it as resolved or take necessary actions such as issuing bans or warnings.
  • Temporary bans can be issued with customizable durations, ranging from minutes to days.

- Benefits

  • Improved Game Integrity: By enabling players to report suspicious activities, you enhance the overall integrity of your game.
  • Enhanced Player Trust: Players feel more secure and trust the gaming environment knowing that there is an effective reporting system in place.
  • Efficient Administration: Streamlined tools and real-time notifications allow administrators to handle reports promptly and effectively.
  • Scalability: The system is designed to handle a large volume of reports, making it suitable for games of all sizes.
  • Customizable: Tailor the report system to fit the specific needs of your game and community.

- Use Cases

  • Cheating Detection: Identify and take action against players using cheats or hacks.
  • Toxic Behavior Management: Manage and mitigate toxic behavior by allowing players to report harassment or abusive language.
  • Bug Reporting: Players can also use the system to report bugs, providing detailed descriptions and evidence, which helps in quicker resolution.

- Pricing and Availability

MxtorieACIA Report Program is available for free, but the unreal engine 5 pre-made plugin for implementation is paid.

Contact and Support

For more information, customization requests, or support, please visit our website or contact us in our Discord Server.


By integrating MxtorieACIA Report Program into your game, you are taking a significant step towards ensuring a fair and enjoyable gaming experience for all players. Our comprehensive tools and intuitive interface make it easy for players to report suspicious activities and for administrators to review and resolve these reports efficiently. Ensure your game remains a trusted and secure environment with MxtorieACIA Report Program.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Ban Status Check: Verify player ban status using ID, HWID, and IP address.
  • Report Creation: Generate detailed reports for player activities with reasons and additional data entries.
  • Automated Player Info Retrieval: Automatically retrieve and update player HWID and IP address.
  • Flexible Data Entry: Add string, integer, float, and boolean data entries to reports.
  • Asynchronous Operations: Perform all network operations asynchronously to avoid blocking gameplay.

Code Modules:

  • ReportProgram: Runtime module for ban status checks and report creation.



Number of Blueprints:

  • None



Number of C++ Classes:

  • 5


Documentation:

  • Available on our Discord Server.



Important/Additional Notes:

  • Account Requirement: Requires users to create an account on Your Website for features like ban status checks and report creation.
  • Platform Specifics: Utilizes WMI for hardware info retrieval, specific to Windows.
  • Data Handling: Uses Unreal Engine JSON utilities for data serialization.
  • Regular Updates: Automatically updates HWID and IP address every 2 minutes for accuracy during long sessions.
